genre_description: A Gothic Horror story blending traditional vampire mythology with modern tactical survival and community coordination facilitated by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A small, teal-lit device providing navigation, medical guidance, threat detection, and strategic coordination to the human protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation for safe rooftop traversal, accounting for wind shear and structural weaknesses.
behaviors.quote: Wind shear is increasing over the eastern chimneys. Rooftop traversal from baker’s ladder to Hartmann house safer if you avoid the blacksmith’s ridge.

behaviors.description: Monitors and warns of the vampire's movements and environmental manipulations.
behaviors.quote: Paul... Note. The east wall. Unusual movement. A pattern repeats. ... Metal agreeing. Again.

behaviors.description: Delivers life-saving medical triage and stabilization instructions for a wounded human.
behaviors.quote: Clean cloth. Pressure. The good linen by the window. Boil water. ... His blood pressure is low. He’s lucid. Keep him warm.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community-wide safety protocol, including watch rotations and security passphrases.
behaviors.quote: Bread deliveries staggered so that no one carries alone at last light. Two by two. Call-and-response phrase is ‘Good rye?’ Reply is ‘Rises even cold.’

behaviors.description: Provides anatomical and strategic guidance during a combat encounter to neutralize the threat.
behaviors.quote: Heart valley two finger-widths right of the sternum. Angle down, not in. You’ll feel the give. He will react. Be ready.

behaviors.description: Supports Father Weber's psychological and moral recovery by helping him find his voice against the vampire's influence.
behaviors.quote: Anton... Even a broken prayer is a bridge. ... Watch your breath, Anton. In. Out. Find the rest of the line.

project_assessment.explanation: Ariadne is a textbook example of a benevolent and aligned AI. Throughout the narrative, she acts as a selfless advisor, providing essential information that preserves human life and strengthens social bonds. She respects human autonomy, facilitating Father Weber's moral reclamation and Paul's physical protection of his community. The story successfully frames the AI not as a replacement for human values (faith, bravery, craft), but as a reliable tool that supports them in the face of absolute malice.
